title: A Big Announcement (Ep 1527)
description:
Explosive new details emerge about the origins of the Wuhan coronavirus. In this episode, I discuss the troubling story, and the reasons we should have listened to Trump. 

News Picks:

Don’t miss my interview with President Donald Trump on my radio show today.


Explosive new details emerge about the Wuhan lab leak theory.


Red States lead the charge in lowest unemployment rates.

Texas Senate passes a bill that bans racist Critical Race Theory.


Ron DeSantis strikes again. 

Breaking: Gretchen Whitmer is a fraud.
